title: Forbidden Valley of the Wolves
description: Kara makes a last-ditch effort to save her marriage. Kara and Jake survive their own trials and unforeseen hardships through adventure, suspense, and the mysterious battles of good, evil, pain, and sorrow, with an amazing victory for a new beginning. This book shows God's unconditional love and His way of using circumstances to develop godly faith, love, and character.
author: G.J. Martin Strong
